page.title: 01 Wideopen and Killingworth
page.content: Wideopen is a village roughly 5 miles north of Newcastle.It is mainly a residential area. There are not a lot of leisure facilities or shops in Wideopen so many people from Wideopen go to Killingworth,a town quite close by where there is a large swimming pool,a shopping complex and a sports centre with many facilities,such as badminton,squash,five-a-side football. A survey of Fourth Year children at Wideopen M.S. showed that Killingworth Baths were the most popular in the area.Many also used the Sports Centre,but Cramlington Leisure Centre attracted more users. Another popular recreational facility in the area is High Gosforth Park which 5 out of 7 children visit to do different activities,jogging,camping, golf etc. but most people just go walking there.
